SummaryEnglish: Aliens arrive at Earth and offer an exo-skeleton with telepathic neuro interface for each metric ton of limestone. Each stand-alone episode looks at the socio-economic and military impact of that encounter over the years up to and including the 25th century.

1.SummaryEnglish:
In 2014, aliens begin to trade the consciousness-controlled multi-purpose robot "EXOFRAMES" with earth. The military potential of the EXOFRAMES disrupt the current world-order.

In 2022, as the world begins to sink into chaos, some stand to intervene in the conflict between Ecuador and Peru. A unit that shouldn’t exist is formed: The U.S. Marine Corps EXOFRAME Force Recon…

2.SummaryEnglish: It is 2015, one year since the aliens appeared. The rapid growth of EXOFRAMES in developing countries oppose the attempts by first-world countries at implementing regulations. Lieutenant Bowman of the U.S. Marine Corps LAR Battalion comes under attack by EXOFRAMES during a stability operation in Angola, Africa. From this day on the battlefield will never be the same.

3.SummaryEnglish: In 2016, the Indian Army is at a crossroads adopting EXOFRAMES into their regular army. They begin using them at the Karakoram Range Siachen glacier in a border dispute with Pakistan. When exchange officer Rei Miyajima from the Japan Self-Defense Forces comes to research high altitude warfare,they encounter a group of EXOFRAMES thought to be the Pakistani Army.

4.SummaryEnglish: In 2017, the threat of EXOFRAMES still grows by the day and countries all over the world remain unable to work out an effective countermeasure. In place of the regular army, private military companies (PMC) and modern mercenaries grow in prominence. When Cerberus Security Services's new recruit, Loewner, does his best to protect civilians during a terrorist raid at an oil terminal in the Middle East, he is confronted with the callous reasoning of a mercenary.

5.SummaryEnglish: As EXOFRAMES permeate conflict zones, armed insurgents realize they can give EXOs to children and make them fight. Forcing them to operate inadequately equipped EXOFRAMES, they are used as sacrificial pawns dying one after another… Day after day these children have no choice but to endure. One day, a man appears and offers to train them as soldiers.

6.SummaryEnglish: Sub-Saharan Africa. Zahir kept his word and trained the children to be soldiers. The child soldiers can now freely maneuver their EXOFRAMES and make a mockery of the regular army thanks to Zahir’s training. The end of the civil war is announced and the time for the child soldiers to return to being normal children has come…

7.SummaryEnglish: 2021. There is an international trend of nations going against the Sankt Gallen Arrangement that regulates market distribution and certain usage of EXOFRAMES. The global world is focused on the military parade being held in the Republic of Azania, a nation leading in this opposition trend.

8.SummaryEnglish: Year 2022. Despite nations around the world investing a huge budget and providing the world's most skilled specialists, attempts to analyze the EXOFRAME and understand the alien technology have failed. In the U.S., Project Xenogage in Area 51 was created to analyze alien technology. But, this project had also been put on hold. Now the project is being taken over by an eccentric leader who is not trying to decipher the alien technology, but rather, trying to find ways to use it.

9.SummaryEnglish: Year 2023. The expansion of the EXOFRAME has destroyed existing industries and has weakened the economies of developed countries, leading to chaos in the international order. No one can stop the conflicts and civil wars that have erupted around the world. The border dispute between Ecuador and Peru has grown large and now involves neighboring countries.The Peruvian Jungle Division's EXOFRAME Platoon came under heavy fire from the mysterious EXOFRAME unit while defending their Forward Operation Base, and was destroyed by snipers.

10.SummaryEnglish: Year 2025 - A group of EXOFRAMES walk through the desert on the Mexican-American border. The people on board are forced to carry drugs in exchange for assistance crossing the border into the United States. One of them is a young girl who is given an amulet of  Santa Muerte - the Saint of Death by the boy next to her. Then suddenly a mortar shell carrying a drone strikes. It's a hostile cartel's attack to take their cargo. The only survivors are the boy, the girl, and their coyote - an illegal border crossing guide.

11.SummaryEnglish: Year 2030. The EXOFRAME, which can operate in any environment, showed its full potential under the sea. The underwater world became a new battlefield for the EXOFRAME. In the Barents Sea adjacent to the Norwegian Sea, Jan and Freya, workers for a private company in disguise, are in charge of maintaining the surveillance network systems to track submarines. Frequent incidents of undersea cables being cut is suggested to be sabotage by the Russians. Therefore, Jan and Freyas' underwater EXOFRAMES are also equipped with self-sustaining underwater robots equipped with explosives for self defense.

12.SummaryEnglish: Bowman and his fellow Marines, who are investigating the worldwide spread of EXOFRAMES discover some footage. It reveals a terrifying future 400 years from now. In the year 2444, the EXOFRAMES’ battlefield moves into space.
